ğŸ“ ğ—”ğ—•ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—§ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—¢ğ—ğ—˜ğ—–ğ—§

Pose2Sim is a Python-based workflow for markerless 3D human and animal kinematics, transforming 2D pose estimations from various sources into detailed 3D motion data compatible with OpenSim. It offers a cost-effective, accurate, and robust alternative to traditional marker-based motion capture, suitable for sports, clinical, and animation applications.

EaseMaster is a web-based tool for visualizing and generating animation easing curves. It allows users to design custom Cubic Bezier curves or tune spring physics parameters, then export production-ready code for CSS, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and GSAP.
